# `aek update`

Synonomous with `npm update`, used to update a specified dependency or global package.

```bash
aek update [package]
```

Details for usage can be obtained using `aek help update`

```bash
Usage: aek update [options]

Options:
   --username
   --password
   --save
   --save-dev
   --save-optional
   --save-exact
   -g, --global
```
